pages.title: Green Sawfish
pages.text: The longcomb sawfish, narrowsnout sawfish or green sawfish ($(o)Pristis zijsron$()) is a species of sawfish in the family Pristidae, found in tropical and subtropical waters of the Indo-West Pacific.$(br2)It has declined drastically and is now considered a critically endangered species.

pages.title: Green Sawfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★★☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: None Days
